hero.bio: Highly motivated Frontend Developer with strong experience building production-ready user interfaces. Skilled in scalable, maintainable architectures with solid expertise in state management, API integration, and component-driven development.

about.title: Who
about.bio1: Highly motivated and hands-on Frontend Developer with strong experience building production-ready user interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks such as React.js / Next.js and Vue.js / Nuxt.js.
about.bio2: Skilled in developing scalable, maintainable, and performance-oriented frontend architectures, with solid experience in state management, API integration (REST & GraphQL), and component-driven UI development.
about.bio3: Passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and translating design systems into reusable frontend components. Experienced in collaborative development environments using Git and modern workflows, with practical exposure to CI/CD processes.
about.bio4: Known for strong analytical problem-solving skills, adaptability, and a continuous drive to learn and grow within frontend-focused teams.
